result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Corey Juha Mohn

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on November 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

11:13 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Corey Juha Mohn. Defendant Corey Juha Mohn in court. Set for PLEAS. Includes 22CM121, 22CM135, 22CM365, and 22TR750. Victim witness in court. Victim in court. ADA Becker recites resolution. Court questions Defendant. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands and pleads Guilty to Count 1: Criminal Damage to Property- 943.01(1) in case 22CM121, Guilty to AMENDED Count 1: Disorderly Conduct -WITHOUT ENHANCER- 947.01(1) in case 22CM135, and Guilty to AMENDED Count 1: Disorderly Conduct- WITHOUT ENHANCER- 947.01(1) in case 22CM365. Court finds that Defendant has freely and voluntarily entered plea and waived rights. Court accepts plea and finds sufficient facts. Court withhold entry of conviction and enters 2 year DJOC. Upon motion of the State, Court dismisses 22CM121 Counts 2 and 3, 22CM135 Counts 2 and 3, 22CM365 Count 2, and 22TR750. Recess 11:30 AM Back on Record 11:58 AM. Court vacates all findings. Court sets PLEAS. Adjourned 12:00 PM
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

9:19 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Corey Juha Mohn. Defendant Corey Juha Mohn in court. Victim Witness in court. Victims appear via zoom. Includes 22CM121, 22CM135, 22CM365, and 22TR750. Court reviews case. Atty Dolfi states DE is scheduled for a Compas Assessment tomorrow and there is a resolution pending the compas results. ADA Becker has no objection. Court addresses victims. Victim makes statements. Court amends bond in 22CM135. Court sets PLEAS. Court confirms address and phone number. Adjourned 09:34 AM
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 11:00 am.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on August 31, 2022 at 09:15 am.

04:04 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Corey Juha Mohn. Defendant Corey Juha Mohn in court. Includes 22CM121, 22CM135, 22CM365, and 22TR750. Court reviews case. Atty Dolfi does not anticipate to file any motions. Recess 04:06 PM. Back on Record 04:07 PM. Court makes statements to DE. Atty Dolfi requests 30 days to see if resolution is possible. Court sets STC. Court confirms address and phone number. Adjourned 04:10 PM
Status conference scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Scheduling Order. Signed by EFV on 6/27/2022. c: DA and Atty via e-file. km
Status conference on July 21, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

$1250 bond on file.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Kianna M., Sondra M., or Julio T.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

01:56 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. DA:  Karl Anderson with Student Intern Ali Casey   DF ATTY: Abrianna Dolfi for today   Corey Juha Mohn appeared. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Atty Dolfi represents DE on other matters, but DE will still need to qualify for PD on this matter. Bond argument; bond ordered. NG.  Reserve on pre-plea rights. Court sets STC. Adjourned at 2:00 PM.  gll  Status conference scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
